txt.en: 'The caves within Emyn Ernil don't simply support themselves, they are held up by networks of scaffolding. This scaffolding is decades old and surely has started to rot and fail. If it does, the entire cave will come collapsing down and anything of value within will be lost.\n\n'While we cannot replace all of the scaffolding, we can do some spot repairs on some of the worst areas. Look around in the cave for scaffolding that appears particularly bad and shore it up.'
The scaffolding holding up the ceiling of the large cave in Emyn Ernil is old and rotting.
'Once we are rid of these Corsairs we'll need to go in and do a proper job of replacing them fully. For now, spot fixes like this will have to do.'
Rotting scaffolding may be found in the large cave beneath Emyn Ernil.\n\nLhossil asked you to venture beneath Emyn Ernil and repair some of the scaffold within that is rotting away.
Lhossil can be found in Dol Amroth.\n\nLhossil will be pleased to hear the scaffold has been shored up.
